suppress.notes: Suppressing as it's a false positive (see: https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258)
latest spring fox and sprint state machine has got this vulnerability
CVE-2016-1000027 cant be fixed since spring has conveyed its a known warning in their documentation details are available to it from here https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-1000027
Spring statemachine core 3.2.0 which is the latest version still got the vulnerability
springfox 3.0.0 latest library still got the vulnerability including spring plugin core 2.0.0
Even after latest spring state machine upgrade 3.2.0 the vulnerability exist
file name: spring-cloud-openfeign-core-3.0.4.jar -> need common component teams to upgrade their clients so as to remove this suppression
file name: camunda-engine-7.15.0.jar (shaded: com.google.code.gson:gson:2.8.5) camunda-rest-client-spring-boot-starter still uses old camunda engine with vulnerability
tomcat embed core high severe dependency from spring boot 1.5.12
